Package controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
controllers.UserController
public class UserController extends Object
Controller class for handling user-related operations. This includes user login, role-based navigation, and user account management functionalities.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Starts the UserController by displaying the login interface.

    • attemptLogin

      public boolean attemptLogin(Scanner scanner)
      Handles user login attempts, allowing a maximum of three attempts.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner instance for user input.
      Returns:
      True if login is successful, false otherwise.

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String hospitalID, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes the password for a user.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID of the user.
      oldPassword - The old password of the user.
      newPassword - The new password of the user.
      Returns:
      True if the password was successfully changed, false otherwise.
